mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommender = #{recommender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organize_id = #{organizeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
headimage_url = #{headimageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_date = #{registDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid_tag = #{validTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARBINARY},
where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommender = #{recommender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organize_id = #{organizeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, headimage_url = #{headimageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_date = #{registDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid_tag = #{validTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARBINARY} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
